translations: v．闲逛，浪费时间：在无目的或无效率地进行某事，通常是为了消磨时间。
· He spent the whole day futzing around the house.
他整天都在家里闲逛，浪费时间。

sentences.sentence: Some use their staycation as therapy–relaxing around the house or futzing in the garden–while others may use the time for projects or home repairs.
sentences.translation: 有些人的宅假期是在家里放松放松或是在花园里走走，有些人则是在家里工作或是整修房间。

sentences.sentence: If you can't find the energy to stop futzing around on Facebook and start writing your project proposal, consider changing out of those stained sweatpants.
sentences.translation: 如果你发现本人不断在脸书上闲逛，提不起精神写项目报告，那么可以考虑换下褪色的运动裤。

sentences.sentence: If you can't find the energy to stop futzing around on Facebook and start writing your project proposal, consider changing out of those stained sweatpants.
sentences.translation: 如果你发现自己一直在脸书上闲逛，提不起精神写项目报告，那么可以考虑换下褪色的运动裤。
